attributes.action: Decrease violent crime in the uk!
attributes.background: In the past few years violent crime in the UK such as knife crimes has increased rapidly causing many many deaths across the country we need to do something about this!

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. 

We understand that you're concerned about violent crime. We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do to decrease crime.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. 

If you would like more funding for police officers, you could also sign this petition: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/228088

You'll need to give your full name to start a petition.
